verbose_text: It seemed reasonable that the increase in PF induced excitation of fusiform cells was due to the increased postsynaptic excitability, and indeed 5-HT increased spike probability of fusiform cells to PF evoked excitatory postsynaptic potentials (EPSPs) across a wide range of fiber stimulus intensities (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
evidence: 5-HT increased spike probability of fusiform cells to PF
